author: Michael Waterhouse
description: This rich cocktail is great when served as a dessert alternative.
name: Key Lime Pie #1
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Licor 43 (or other spiced vanilla liqueur) (chilled)

recipeInstructions.text: DRY SHAKE (without ice) cream and vanilla liqueur in a pre-chilled shaker to mix and aerate
Use to rim glass and set the remainder rest aside
SHAKE last 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled, rimmed glass
Then carefully float pre-prepared cream and liqueur mix over the cocktail's surface
